mapper.update:
update maintenanceitems
oName = #{oname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=REAL},
priceClass = #{priceclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitPrice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=REAL},
money = #{money,jdbcType=REAL},
settlementPrice = #{settlementprice,jdbcType=REAL},
errorDesc = #{errordesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
errorCause = #{errorcause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
theMaintenanceCrew = #{themaintenancecrew,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
busyWorkGroup = #{busyworkgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
server = #{server,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workOrderNumber = #{workordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
freeOfChargeFor = #{freeofchargefor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update maintenanceitems set oName = #{oname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=REAL}, priceClass = #{priceclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitPrice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=REAL}, money = #{money,jdbcType=REAL}, settlementPrice = #{settlementprice,jdbcType=REAL}, errorDesc = #{errordesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, errorCause = #{errorcause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, theMaintenanceCrew = #{themaintenancecrew,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, busyWorkGroup = #{busyworkgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, server = #{server,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workOrderNumber = #{workordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, freeOfChargeFor = #{freeofchargefor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM maintenanceitems m JOIN testoncompletion t ON m.`workOrderNumber` = t.`repairOrder` WHERE t.`licensePlateNumber` = #{cNum}
